reviews.review: most people are toxic  but this game + wax pen= fun
好 小儿麻痹都好了
Fun, good for the family and depression.

It's a decent game, but the games matchmaking in ranked game is absolute dogwater, and needs to be fixed. I should be silver and get into a ranked game against Global Elites, and get deranked from that game. Thats not even fair.

The game has recently messed up the ranking system. Lately the enemies have been 3-4 ranks higher than everyone on my team. We have been getting slaughtered the last dozen games or so because of the terrible matchup system. I think after more than 10 years of play CS I am seriously considering retiring it.
this game is so bad that it is so good! me when the the me when the!

游戏很好，但是对新手不算友好，建议新手先打打人机练手，人机不要太简单，最低也要是普通才能练出手感，强一点的，建议先玩死亡竞赛，个人认为那是练枪，练手感的最佳方式，比打人机有效，想练投掷物，进服务器。要记地图建议人机，总之，100h新手，500h入门，精通可能就要好几千h了，建议新手买优先资格，没有优先资格外挂多，优先资格还能帮助匹配相同实力对手（也有可能是老板买优先资格炸鱼），增强游戏体验，注：娱乐局不要起连狙，因为会给到对面造成不良游戏体验，你想，休闲模式一队10人，都起连狙，对面还怎么玩？切记切记...
This game is so meow..! u-u
